params.root: Merkle tree root if voting is locked. Leave empty for public voting

returns._0: array of positive votes sorted by id
returns._1: array of negative votes sorted by id

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.proposalId: Id of the proposal to vote for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ProposalCreated(uint256,uint8,bytes32,ui.notice: Event emitted when a proposal is created

VoteRecorded(uint256,uint256,address,boo.notice: Event emitted when a vote is recorded

VoteSent(uint256,uint8,address,bool).notice: Event emitted when a vote is sent

getAddressVotesForProposal(uint256,addre.notice: Gets the number of votes for an address for proposal

getProposalStatus(uint256).notice: Gets the number of positive and negative votes of all options in a proposal

userdoc.notice: Contract to create projects and collect votes
